mapper.select: SELECT property.SCPROPERTY_ID, property.SCHOOL_ID, property.DIC_ID, dic.NAME FROM SC_SCPROPERTY property LEFT JOIN SYS_DICTIONARIES dic ON dic.DIC_ID = property.DIC_ID WHERE property.SCHOOL_ID = #{SCHOOL_ID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SC_SCPROPERTY (SCPROPERTY_ID, SCHOOL_ID, DIC_ID) VALUES (#{SCPROPERTY_ID}, #{SCHOOL_ID}, #{DIC_ID})
